description: Behance, part of the Adobe family, is the leading online platform to showcase & discover creative work. The creative world updates their work in one place to broadcast it widely and efficiently. Companies explore the work and access talent on a global scale.

blocks.name: getAllProjects
blocks.description: The getAllProjects endpoints allow you to browse all projects.

args.name: clientId
args.info: API client id.

args.name: searchQuery
args.info: Free text query string.

args.name: sort
args.info: The order the results are returned in.

args.name: time
args.info: Limits the search by time.

args.name: field
args.info: Limits the search by creative field.Field name from the list of defined creative fields.

args.name: country
args.info: Limits the search by a 2-letter FIPS country code.

args.name: state
args.info: Limits the search by state or province name.

args.name: city
args.info: Limits the search by city name.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number of the results, always starting with 1.

args.name: tags
args.info: Limits the search by tags.

args.name: colorHex
args.info: Limit results to an RGB hex value (without #).

args.name: colorRange
args.info: How closely to match the requested colorHex, in color shades (default:20) [0-255]

args.name: license
args.info: Filter by creative license. Acronyms found here: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/

blocks.name: getProject
blocks.description: Get the information and content of a project.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: API key.

args.name: projectId
args.info: Project id on which we will receive data.

args.name: projectId

args.name: page
args.info: The page number of the results, always starting with 1.

blocks.name: getAllCreativeFields
blocks.description: Retrieves all Creative Fields in two groups, all fields (in 'fields') and popular ones (in 'popular')
